ciscoBgpPolAcctMIB.name: ciscoBgpPolAcctMIB

revisions.description: Added egress, packet and octet, counters for the BGP policy accounting feature.
Initial version of this MIB module.

ciscoBgpPolAcctMIB.contactinfo: Cisco Systems Customer Service Postal: 170 W. Tasman Drive San Jose, CA 95134 USA Tel: +1 800 553-NETS E-mail: cs-snmp@cisco.com

cbpAcctTable.name: cbpAcctTable
cbpAcctTable.description: The cbpAcctTable provides statistics about ingress and egress traffic on an interface. This data could be used for purposes like billing.

cbpAcctEntry.name: cbpAcctEntry
cbpAcctEntry.description: Each cbpAcctEntry provides statistics for traffic of interest on an ingress and/or egress interfaces. The traffic of interest may be used for purposes like billing, and is referred to from here on in the MIB by the term 'traffic-type', which corresponds to cbpAcctTrafficIndex. Traffic-types are configured by the user on a per interface basis. The statistics include ingress packet counts, ingress octet counts, egress packet counts and egress octet counts. Entries are created when traffic-type is configured on an interface. Entries are deleted automatically when the user removes the corresponding traffic-type configuration from an interface.

cbpAcctTrafficIndex.name: cbpAcctTrafficIndex
cbpAcctTrafficIndex.description: An integer value greater than 0, that uniquely identifies a traffic-type. The traffic-type has no intrinsic meaning. It just means the traffic coming into an interface can be differentiated into different types. It is up to the user to give meaning to and configure the various traffic-types on an interface.

cbpAcctInPacketCount.name: cbpAcctInPacketCount
cbpAcctInPacketCount.description: The total number of packets received for a particular traffic-type on an interface.

cbpAcctInOctetCount.name: cbpAcctInOctetCount
cbpAcctInOctetCount.description: The total number of octets received for a particular traffic-type on an interface.

cbpAcctOutPacketCount.name: cbpAcctOutPacketCount
cbpAcctOutPacketCount.description: The total number of packets transmitted for a particular traffic-type on an interface.

cbpAcctOutOctetCount.name: cbpAcctOutOctetCount
cbpAcctOutOctetCount.description: The total number of octets transmitted for a particular traffic-type on an interface.

ciscoBgpPolAcctMIBCompliance.name: ciscoBgpPolAcctMIBCompliance
ciscoBgpPolAcctMIBCompliance.description: The compliance statement for entities which implement this Cisco BGP-Policy Traffic Accounting MIB.

ciscoBgpPolAcctMIBComplianceRev1.name: ciscoBgpPolAcctMIBComplianceRev1
ciscoBgpPolAcctMIBComplianceRev1.description: The compliance statement for entities which implement this Cisco BGP-Policy Traffic Accounting MIB.

cbpAcctTableGroup.name: cbpAcctTableGroup
cbpAcctTableGroup.description: A collection of objects providing customer traffic related parameters.

cbpAcctTableGroupRev1.name: cbpAcctTableGroupRev1
cbpAcctTableGroupRev1.description: A collection of objects providing customer traffic related parameters.
